title: Extra Money Giveaway
description: The Extra Money Giveaway was a mircosite developed for H&R Block as a fun way to give away money and free tax services. This site hasn't been up for a while now but it was one of my first full site builds I had ever done. The site was built using flash and papaervision 3d in order to achieve the 3d floating. The most intertesting part that was done on this site was the reflection on the cubes. Papervision has a reflection class for the cubes but it didâ€™t achieve the look that we were going for so I had to write my own. In the end I duplicated the image that was on the face of the cube on the fly, flipped it and created a gradient mask on the bottom from the bottom up.
